SELECT.QUERY-TABLE: T_CMS_WEBINFO TW, T_SYS_USER TU1, T_SYS_USER TU2
SELECT.FIELD: TW.ID AS id, TW.TITLE AS title, TW.ISTOP AS isTop, TW.CREATETIME AS createTime, TW.MODTIME AS modTime, TW.PUBLISHTIME AS publishTime, TW.INFOSTATUS AS infoStatus, TU1.USERNAME AS createUserName, TU2.USERNAME AS modUserName
SELECT.ORDER-BY: TW.STATUS ASC, TW.ISTOP DESC, TW.MODTIME DESC

SELECT.QUERY-TABLE: T_CMS_SUCCESSSTORIES TS, T_SYS_USER TU1, T_SYS_USER TU2, T_CMS_WEBCOLUMN TC
SELECT.FIELD: TS.ID AS id, TS.PROJECTNAME AS projectName, TS.INDUSTRY AS industry, TS.PROJECTTYPE AS projectType, TS.SERVICES AS services, TS.ISTOP AS isTop, TS.MODTIME AS modTime, TS.CASESTATUS AS caseStatus, TS.CREATETIME AS createTime, TS.MODTIME AS modTime, TC.ID AS webColumnId, TU1.USERNAME AS createUserName, TU2.USERNAME AS modUserName, TC.NAME AS webColumnName
SELECT.WHERE: TS.WEBCOLUMNID = TC.ID AND TS.CREATEUSER = TU1.ID AND TS.MODUSER = TU2.ID
SELECT.ORDER-BY: TS.caseStatus ASC, TS.ISTOP DESC, TS.MODTIME DESC

SELECT.QUERY-TABLE: T_CMS_NAVIGATION TN LEFT JOIN T_CMS_WEBCOLUMN TC ON TN.WEBCOLUMNID = TC.ID
SELECT.FIELD: TN.ID AS id, TN.WEBCOLUMNID AS webColumnId, TN.SORTNO AS sortNo, TC.NAME AS name, TC.CODE AS code

SELECT.QUERY-TABLE: T_CMS_WEBINFO TI LEFT JOIN T_CMS_WEBCOLUMN TW ON TI.WEBCOLUMNID = TW.ID
SELECT.FIELD: TI.ID AS webInfoId, TI.TITLE AS webInfoTitle, TI.KEYWORDS AS keywords, TI.PUBLISHTIME AS publishTime, TW.CODE AS webColumnCode, TW.SHOWTYPE AS webColumnShowType
